## waterfall() function

Calls each `task` using the result of the previous `task`<!-- -->. Resolves with the result of the last `task`<!-- -->. The first `task` should not take any argument.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function waterfall<T extends AsyncFunction[]>(tasks: T): Async<GetLastReturnType<T>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tasks | T | Functions to run in order |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Async](./promizr.async.md)<!-- -->&lt;GetLastReturnType&lt;T&gt;&gt;
